description: GIMP Core Analysis for Vimp Port - Analyze GIMP codebase structure and patterns

userStories.title: Setup Reference Environment
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the GIMP source code available locally in a `ref` directory so I can grep/read it, but I don't want it polluting my `git status`.
acceptanceCriteria: git status in Vimp root does not show ref/

userStories.title: Analyze Application Structure
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to know the high-level directory structure of GIMP so I know where to look for specific features.
acceptanceCriteria: Section on 'Directory Structure' describing key folders (app, libgimp, etc.)
userStories.notes: Completed. Analysis document created at doc/gimp-analysis.md

userStories.title: Identify Core Data Structures
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to understand how GIMP represents an image and layers so I can design Vimp's model.
acceptanceCriteria: specific references to C files/structs defining GimpImage, GimpLayer, etc.
